Now, implementing this in C with a hash map.

The hash map implementation:

Let's choose BUCKET_SIZE as a prime number, say 1000003.

We'll have an array of pointers to linked lists.

struct entry {
    int key;
    int count;
    struct entry *next;
};

#define BUCKET_SIZE 1000003

struct entry *buckets[BUCKET_SIZE];

void init_hash() {
    for (int i=0; i<BUCKET_SIZE; i++) buckets[i] = NULL;
}

void add_to_hash(int key) {
    int hash = key % BUCKET_SIZE;
    if (hash <0) hash += BUCKET_SIZE;
    struct entry *e = buckets[hash];
    while (e) {
        if (e->key == key) {
            e->count++;
            return;
        }
        e = e->next;
    }
    // not found, add new entry
    struct entry *new_e = malloc(sizeof(struct entry));
    new_e->key = key;
    new_e->count =1;
    new_e->next = buckets[hash];
    buckets[hash] = new_e;
}

int get_count(int key) {
    int hash = key % BUCKET_SIZE;
    if (hash <0) hash += BUCKET_SIZE;
    struct entry *e = buckets[hash];
    while (e) {
        if (e->key == key) return e->count;
        e = e->next;
    }
    return 0;
}

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

#define BUCKET_SIZE 1000003

struct entry {
    int key;
    int count;
    struct entry *next;
};

struct entry *buckets[BUCKET_SIZE];

void init_hash() {
    for (int i = 0; i < BUCKET_SIZE; i++) {
        buckets[i] = NULL;
    }
}

void add_to_hash(int key) {
    int hash = key % BUCKET_SIZE;
    if (hash < 0) hash += BUCKET_SIZE;
    struct entry *e = buckets[hash];
    while (e) {
        if (e->key == key) {
            e->count++;
            return;
        }
        e = e->next;
    }
    // Not found, create new entry
    struct entry *new_e = (struct entry*)malloc(sizeof(struct entry));
    new_e->key = key;
    new_e->count = 1;
    new_e->next = buckets[hash];
    buckets[hash] = new_e;
}

int get_count(int key) {
    int hash = key % BUCKET_SIZE;
    if (hash < 0) hash += BUCKET_SIZE;
    struct entry *e = buckets[hash];
    while (e) {
        if (e->key == key) return e->count;
        e = e->next;
    }
    return 0;
}
